name: Puzzle Girls: Cute
description:
Puzzle Girls: Cute is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork.
Featuring characters from various games to enjoy and play with.

A relaxing puzzle game to have fun with.

The base game is completely free to play and includes a variety of levels to enjoy.

Features:

  • A selection of puzzle art to unlock and enjoy.
  • Multiple difficulty settings to make the puzzles more complex
  • Swap Tiles, Rotate tiles & flip tiles horizontally and vertically to complete the puzzles.
  • One handed gaming for easier play!
